name: FIDGET MENU
description:
A eye-burning bouncy physic based menu, because why not

What started off as a simple student exercice of menu making turned into this thing.  So yeah, here's a fidget menu full of copyrighted music and eye-destroying colors.

>> Bubbly buttons
>> Exploding titles
>> Dancing clowns
>> Credits lever
>> 5 different eyesore themes


Made by : Thomas Vignes

Clown Model by : Alline_art
